attributes.action: Choice of essays or presentations for University and college students
attributes.additional_details: This is coming from my personal beliefs and feelings yes but my fellow students are in favour of this as it allows for students to have a more personalised approach to their work.
attributes.background: I'm dyslexic and I find it difficult to write assignments over near 4000 words in university. I would rather stand in front of my lecturer and do a presentation instead of writing. I have felt like this effects my grades and my ability to get my point across. This would allow people like me a chance

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Assessment decisions are a matter for individual institutions, however there is already a legal requirement to make reasonable adjustments.  You can find out more here:

https://www.bdadyslexia.org.uk/advice/children/my-childs-education/reasonable-adjustments-in-education
